document_data.caption: A drow arachne riding her spider mount.
document_data.name: Arachne
document_data.used-by: Female [[drow]], [[half-drow]], [[aranea]], [[choldrith]], [[Deep_dragon|Deep dragon]], or [[draegloth]] divine spellcasters devoted to [[Lolth]]
document_data.otherprereqs3e: Must have passed the Test of Lolth|type3e=Prestige Class}}
document_data.mainbody: '''arachne''' was a powerful [[cleric]] of [[Lolth]]. The arachne called upon Lolth's power only to dominate everyone else in drow society.
document_data.Abilities: Arachne were able to summon [[hairy spider]]s as [[familiar]]s, and skilled arachne could see through the eyes of their familiars. In addition, experienced arachne were able to use [[giant spider]]s as a mounts. These clerics, when they become skilled enough, were able to create types of [[undead]] known as [[zin-carla]]. These undead could be commanded by the arachne themselves, and would carry out their will. These spellcasters of the greatest power became divine in nature and effectively immortal. They could also assume the shape of [[yochlol]]s, the closest minions of Lolth.
